body.p: An element that renders its children on top of each other. The first element is placed on the bottom and each successive child is placed above the previous. All elements are displayed at once. Child elements may also be placed at absolute positions within the stack.
The template.XULAttr("top"), template.XULAttr("right"), template.XULAttr("bottom"), and template.XULAttr("left") attributes on a child of the stack specify the position of that element.
More information is available in the XUL tutorial.
